text: Emilio Vives (born 1909, date of death unknown) was an Argentine swimmer. He competed in the men's 4 × 200 metre freestyle relay event at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Argentine male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Argentina Category:Swimmers at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing Category:Male freestyle swimmers
title: Emilio Vives
